website_summaries.verdict: Because it uses an existing skimmer connection, no additional plumbing is required. We suggest using the two-wheeled cleaner for pools no larger than 16' by 24' for max. efficiency.
pros: Uses several pre-programmed cleaning patterns to ensure 100% coverage
Rugged wheels capable of climbing pool walls
Special turbine blades maintain movement at any pressure level
cons: Wheels could damage pool liner over time
Shares same water line as skimmers, creating hours of downtime
4-wheel model best for larger, deeper pools

customer_reviews.title: Great automatic pool cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: We have a lap pool with the deep end being in the center and this cleaner does a great job. We have had it for almost a year now and so far so good. We have not had to make any adjustments and nothing has broken on it or the hose. It does move a bit slower then our Polaris 360 did, but it gets the pool very clean and costs a lot less, with a lot of less moving parts to break and replace. We did add a leaf catcher so not too much Debris is put into the filter. It’s a real nice cleaner and we DO recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: dthomas

customer_reviews.title: OVerall satisfied, but in hindsight might have chosen a different model.
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for about 2 months now. Overall it does a good job cleaning the pool and seems very sturdy. The reason for the 4-star rating is that it sometimes gets stuck on our drain covers, which seem to be a pretty standard size and shape. It's also not able to climb the walls more than about 2ft or so in the deep end. Presumably this is because we have a pebble tec liner, which is a bit more porous than normal plaster would be.
customer_reviews.author: Theodora

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't hesitate to recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my last vacuum (14 years old) with this. It's all over the pool and it is cleaning very thoroughly. I am extremely satisfied with this and expect it to last for years. I like the vacuum regulator that comes with it. My last one didn't have that feature. I like the hose on it. It is very pliable. I think there are people who have had vacuums that go the deepest part of their pools and stay there. This goes all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Taft

customer_reviews.title: Awful product and awful customer service from Hayward
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work and Hayward was zero help with service after the sale. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Slow and steady gets things clean
customer_reviews.text: This automatic pool vacuum (AKA Pool Sweep) moves at a much slower pace than other types of sweeps but it gets the job done. Our pool man said this was by far the best and most reliable sweep and so far in the 2 months it's been in use, it has worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Wibbs

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought the four wheel...
customer_reviews.text: This cleans the bottom of my pool very well, but it doesn’t really go up the sides as described. I was really hoping that I would get that type of suction and cleaning power so that I did not have to scrub the sides of the pool with a brush so often. I should have bought the stronger four wheel one.
customer_reviews.author: GameGirl

customer_reviews.title: Need a refund or an exchange
customer_reviews.text: We could not get this product to work. Couldn’t send it back since the refund period was up. We continuously tried to make it work for weeks since we truly believed the reviews that it was the best cleaner. I can’t afford to lose 400.00 we need some assistance with this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Demetria Farewell

customer_reviews.title: Good for sucking up twigs and leaves!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dads pool that has a giant eucalyptus tree next to it that sheds sticks and leaves constantly, his pool was always green. My first impression was that it is cheaply made , but it is working very very well, doesn’t get jammed up on sticks, great design, pool looks crystal clear, been running for 6 months now, so I am quite pleased so far!
customer_reviews.author: Supine Luborrsky

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. It connects to the skimmer and it constantly gets stuck it’ll just stop suctioning and moving. It leaves trails of where it went and doesn’t clean the entire pool it just stays on one side you have to keep manually moving it to the section you want. It’s the most ANNOYING device ever.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: A Wonderful Pool Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this pool cleaner for 6 months. It runs for 5 hours per day. It has never gotten stuck, cleans every part of the pool, and has been maintenance free. Much better than other suction cleaners I have owned in the past.
customer_reviews.author: A. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I have a Hayward 1 HP pump/filter...and this vacuum would NOT go more than 3 min without stopping. It would not climb the walls. It got stuck in the deep end. I guess it worked ok for the 3 min period it would run. I give it 3 stars because it was very easy to install and return.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Still the Best
customer_reviews.text: Although it looks like it has changed ownership the unit still is the best one we have ever found in 25+ years. In fact it is the only unit we have found that works like pool cleaners should work. This is our second one.
customer_reviews.author: jniles

customer_reviews.title: This is what the pool man suggested
customer_reviews.text: This was the pool cleaner that the pool guy told me to get. He also told me that it was much cheaper on Amazon. Installation was easy... cause the pool guy did it. It works much better than the old unit. We are very happy and the pool is very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Marticci

customer_reviews.title: This equipment is not cheap, however it should work more then three months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the item, and it stop working, I called the company and they told me they will send an email to trouble shoot, if that did not work they will call out a person to fix it. I have not received an email, second phone call or a person to fix it. This product is over $400.00 it should at least last over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: This vac does a great job. We replaced a 10 year old Hayward ultra and the pool looks so much cleaner. Also doesn't get clogged like the Hayward sometimes did - prying a drowned mouse out of the mechanism was not pleasant. This guy just leaves them, which is still gross but a lot easier to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Ducati Woman

customer_reviews.title: Hayward W3PVS20JST Poolvergnuegen Pool Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This Hayward pool cleaner really do the job. I have been with this product for over six years, the one I am using is my second one. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mag357

customer_reviews.title: Good shipper
customer_reviews.text: Third one for us and easy to rebuild yourself if need too, runs 8 hours a day in Arizona hot sun and never need to worry pool is always clean
customer_reviews.author: Muzz

customer_reviews.title: Great way to clean the pool
customer_reviews.text: We use this vacuum for our salt water pool and it is amazing! It picks up any debris on the bottom and even climbs the walls of the pool!
customer_reviews.author: jenalee

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok but I think my Hayward navigator worked better. I feel like the suction in this sweep is not as strong. Little pricey considering performance.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Little pricey, but worth the money. Easy to assemble and so far works amazing. Climbs up sides like it claims unlike others.
customer_reviews.author: Aliss

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile to adjust and to get it to climb walls. The longer it's on the more it shows off its tricks! Happy we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee B.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this it’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing sucks up all the yucky stuff on the bottom of the pool that you cannot reach with a pool cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband says it works great and was recommended by our pool company.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cavalla

customer_reviews.title: This is a great investment for your pool!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of spending over $400 on a pool cleaner, but when I saw it at a discount price, I had to get it. Our pool service company highly recommended it. I have owned the cleaner for over two months, and we are pleased with it. The bottom of our pool would get extremely dirty between our weekly service, but now it is spotless.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Hoodwinked
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this product for approximately 3 months and the wheels have stopped working. I read the reviews and it seemed to be. Good product. It worked ok for a couple of months. It was never great. My husband is going to attempt to fix the wheels. At this point this product is a stretch at 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Zavala

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works like it's supposed to. Make a huge difference in keeping our spool clean
customer_reviews.author: BColbert

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t do the best in suction! Did try to return in back but I just passed my 30 days so now stuck with it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: It is a very useful item.
customer_reviews.text: I had to clean the swimming pool myself during the pandemic. The swimming pool is very clean now.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble to replace our old one. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Palmer

customer_reviews.title: doesn't do the job
customer_reviews.text: does not climb any wall , line is too short
customer_reviews.author: cornel

customer_reviews.title: Simple to assemble works great
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to install. It works great. I have NO leaves at the bottom of my pool. There are tons of installation/assembly videos online.
customer_reviews.author: Notfor thepublic

customer_reviews.title: This little guy does his job very well
customer_reviews.text: This has been a very efficient and reliable robot. Great for the pool and even the kids like following "Blue" around the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the fact it doesn’t need a booster pump
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it keeps my pool clean and so easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Darrell W. Rahn

customer_reviews.title: Performance
customer_reviews.text: The pool clean is efficient and it does it job. Some time the unit goes above the water line nd sucks air into the enclosed system causing air in the filter. Look to be sturdy and well made better then the Navigator.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mar

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Our pool has a really light pebble-tec finish so dirt shows and will leave stains. This product has our pool looking great all the time and we get _a lot_ of wind and some very nasty sand storms. Not many leaves for it to deal with here.
customer_reviews.author: SJF

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for over a year now after our older vacuum died. It either vacuums too slowly or makes terrible noises from over suction. Most of the time it just sits and spins in a circle. Have had our pool guy adjust it over a dozen times. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: gary gruber

customer_reviews.title: Don’t mind the 1-2 star reviews...
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent! I think all the bad reviews about it floating etc are likely user error.... Just ordered new set of tires for it at $11/pair. A year of use not so bad! Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Toddschilling

product_meta.title: Hayward W3PVS20JST Poolvergnuegen Pool Cleaner (Automatic Pool Vacuum), White
product_meta.description: Hayward’s Poolvergnuegen 2-Wheel Suction PoolCleaner uses your existing pool pump and filter for power—simply plug it into the designated suction port or the skimmer for quick an easy setup. Featuring patented self-adjusting turbine vanes, PoolCleaner delivers maximum power at any flow and allows passage of larger, more stubborn debris. Patented tire treads enhance climbing ability and obstacle maneuverability while patented adjustable roller skirts allow the cleaner to maintain optimal suction on uneven surfaces and when encountering obstacles. Multiple pre-programmed internal steering sequences ensure complete pool coverage—PoolCleaner travels 8 to 10 feet before turning, and turns can range from 90 to 450 degrees. For average-sized pools up to 16’ x 32’, the 2-wheel Poolvergnuegen PoolCleaner is a powerful, efficient choice.
feature_bullets: The Hayward Poolvergnuegen 2-Wheel Suction PoolCleaner features patented self-adjusting turbine vanes that deliver maximum power at any flow and allow passage of large debris
2-wheel drive cleans average-sized pools up to 16’ x 32’
Patented tire treads enhance climbing ability and obstacle maneuverability
Multiple pre-programmed internal steering sequences ensure complete pool coverage and efficient cleaning
Patented adjustable roller skirts allow the cleaner to maintain optimal suction on uneven surfaces and when encountering obstacles

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars188 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
